name: Pan-European Insurance Forum
boss: legal responsibility  shared by all CEOs
membership: PEIF is open to dialogue with all stakeholders with an interest in European affairs related to insurance and reinsurance. In particular, it cooperates with Insurance Europe, CFO and CRO Forums.
goal:
PEIF's purposes are:
- to promote understanding and recognition of the role of the insurance business model within the development of the Europe Union and
- to provide its Members with the opportunity to discuss major policy and strategic issues affecting the insurance business in Europe and worldwide.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
• Consumer affairs
• Economic affairs

• Enterprise
